scripts.prettier: npm run prettier-index && npm run prettier-package && npm run prettier-src && npm run prettier-test
scripts.eslint: npm run eslint-index && npm run eslint-src && npm run eslint-test
scripts.markdownlint: npm run markdownlint-github && npm run markdownlint-md
scripts.yamllint: npm run yamllint-github && npm run yamllint-yml
scripts.dist: npm install && npm run prettier && npm run eslint && npm run markdownlint && npm run yamllint && node test
